QuestData.Title: The Slumbering Ancients
QuestData.Description: We may not have twenty stone giants to take on our enemy, but we giants of ancient lumber are as strong as any rock.$B$BLook around you, $r. My kindred sleep... yet they will heed the keeper's horn when the time of need is upon them.$B$BYou will find Aros, the keeper of the grove, beyond the bridge northeast of here.$B$BTell him the urgency of our situation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Aros northeast of the Grove of the Ancients in Darkshore.
QuestData.RewardText: Aros's body appears to be lifeless yet still warm. Perhaps his killers are nearby.
